DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective chart review gather information Sensipar pattern use effect biochemical parameter renal transplant recipient
DOC.criteria: Adults > = 18 year old Subjects receive Sensipar duration least 3 month , begin least 3 month kidney transplant . Subjects must begin Sensipar teatment later Februry 28 , 2005 treat physician 's discretion . Subjects receive Sensipar undergo kidney transplant Subjects receive dialysis posttransplant
